posts.title: What is React?
posts.body: Can you explain what React is and how it works?
posts.author: John Doe

answers.body: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
answers.author: Jane Doe

answers.body: React allows you to create reusable UI components.
answers.author: Bob Smith
